name: Bmelgren - Shimmer N Shine

wave_b=0.500000

per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.500*( 0.60*sin(0.933*time) + 0.40*sin(1.045*time) );
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.500*( 0.60*sin(0.900*time) + 0.40*sin(0.956*time) );
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.500*( 0.60*sin(0.910*time) + 0.40*sin(0.920*time) );
per_frame_4=rot = rot + 0.060*( 0.60*sin(0.381*treb_att) + 0.60*sin(0.579*time) );
per_frame_5=warp = rot;
per_frame_6=zoomexp=warp+.5;
per_frame_7=mv_x=3.25;
per_frame_8=mv_y=48;
per_frame_9=mv_l=mid+1;
per_pixel_1=zoom=zoom+0.07*cos(rad*20+time*2.5);
